name: Mt. Gox Hack & Collapse
description: Mt. Gox, handling 70% of global BTC transactions, filed for bankruptcy in Tokyo District Court after losing 850,000 BTC.
description_cn: Mt. Gox 交易所（当时承载全球 70% 交易量）在东京地方法院正式申请破产保护。此前该公司承认因系统漏洞被黑客盗取 85 万枚比特币，CEO Mark Karpeles 在发布会上鞠躬道歉，引发长达两年的熊市。
impact_pattern: Long-term bear market, loss of trust in centralized exchanges.

name: China 9/4 ICO Ban
description: Seven Chinese ministries (PBoC, CAC, etc.) jointly issued a notice banning ICOs and demanding refunds.
description_cn: 中国央行、网信办等七部委联合发布《关于防范代币发行融资风险的公告》，定性 ICO 为非法集资，要求立即停止并清退已融资金。随后火币、OKCoin 等交易所宣布停止人民币交易，导致比特币当日暴跌 35%。
impact_pattern: Panic selling, migration of industry out of China.

name: Black Thursday (Covid Crash)
description: WHO declared Covid-19 a pandemic, triggering a global liquidity crisis. BitMEX liquidation engine overwhelmed.
description_cn: 世卫组织宣布新冠为全球大流行，美股熔断引发流动性枯竭。比特币在 24 小时内从 $8000 跌至 $3800，BitMEX 交易所因多头连环爆仓导致服务器宕机（拔网线），DeFi 协议面临清算死亡螺旋。
impact_pattern: Massive liquidations across all assets, rapid recovery due to QE.

name: Luna/UST De-pegging
description: Curve pool imbalance triggered UST de-pegging. LFG sold 80k BTC to defend peg but failed.
description_cn: Curve 3pool 中 UST 占比异常引发恐慌抛售。尽管 LFG 基金会出售 8 万枚 BTC 护盘，但 UST 仍跌破 $0.98，触发 LUNA 增发死亡螺旋。随后 Do Kwon 在推特发布 'Steady lads' 但无力回天，400 亿美元市值归零。
impact_pattern: Systemic risk contagion, collapse of major lenders (Celsius, 3AC).

name: FTX Bankruptcy Filing
description: FTX Group filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy in Delaware after CoinDesk report exposed Alameda's balance sheet.
description_cn: 在 CoinDesk 曝光 Alameda 资产负债表主要由 FTT 构成后，币安赵长鹏 (CZ) 宣布清仓 FTT 引发挤兑。FTX 无法应对 60 亿美元提款需求，SBF 在特拉华州申请破产重组，随后被巴哈马警方逮捕。
impact_pattern: Extreme panic, multi-year low for BTC, regulatory crackdown.

name: Bitcoin $100k Breakout
description: Bitcoin's price surpassed $100,000 for the first time, triggering broad FOMO and elevated volatility across the crypto market.
description_cn: 比特币价格首次突破 10 万美元关口，引发市场 FOMO 情绪并带来显著波动，带动整个加密市场交易活跃度上升。
impact_pattern: FOMO followed by extreme volatility as late buyers enter.

name: U.S. Strategic Bitcoin Reserve Executive Order
description: President Trump signed an executive order (EO 14233) establishing a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve and a U.S. Digital Asset Stockpile; the reserve is described as being funded by forfeited bitcoin held by the U.S. Treasury.
description_cn: 特朗普签署行政令（EO 14233）建立“战略比特币储备”和“美国数字资产储备库”。公开资料描述该储备主要由美国财政部持有的罚没比特币（forfeited bitcoin）构成。
impact_pattern: Policy shock and narrative shift; short-term repricing and high volatility.

name: U.S. 'Liberation Day' Tariff Announcement
description: The U.S. announced a large-scale new tariff policy package (nicknamed "Liberation Day"), triggering a global risk-off shock and sharp cross-asset volatility.
description_cn: 美国宣布大规模新关税政策（被媒体称为“Liberation Day”），引发全球风险偏好快速转向，带来跨资产剧烈波动。
impact_pattern: Risk-off sentiment, cross-asset volatility; intermittent decoupling from equities.
